alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 7:30PM EDT until August 10 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHEASTERN FLOYD AND SOUTHWESTERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 730 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported water flowing over multiple roads, stranding motorists along Robinson and Indian creeks. Up to 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Speight. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
